author: gdaniels
msg: Two bits: 1) this should be a beanMapping to avoid exactly the kind of typo
which I fixed in the last commit, and 2) we should start using the
service-specific-mapping paradigm more often, since it cleanly scopes
things and makes it clear which mappings associate with which services.

author: scheu
msg: Interop Fix: Changed to use SOAP 1.1 format over the wire
